testcase.name: I_Can_Login_Into_The_Tools_Qa_Page_With_An_Existing_User_And_Correct_Password
testcase.system-out: @scenario.begin @RUN scenario: I can login into the Tools QA page with an existing user and correct password given I open the Tools QA page ... Status.passed in 10.67s when I complete the user name field with testing user name ... Status.passed in 0.08018s when I complete the password field with testing user password ... Status.passed in 0.06597s when I click the Login button ... Status.passed in 2.107s then I see the "profile" page is displayed ... Status.passed in 0.004214s then I see the user name is displayed in the page ... Status.passed in 0.0319s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

testcase.name: After_Login_I_Can_See_The_Elements_Menu_And_Click_On_Text_Box_Option
testcase.system-out: @scenario.begin @RUN scenario: After login I can see the "Elements" menu and click on "Text Box" option given I open the Tools QA page ... Status.passed in 19.68s when I complete the user name field with testing user name ... Status.passed in 0.0742s when I complete the password field with testing user password ... Status.passed in 0.06564s when I click the Login button ... Status.passed in 3.143s when I expand "Elements" menu ... Status.passed in 0.06755s when I click "Text Box" option ... Status.passed in 0.0767s then I see the "Text Box" page is displayed ... Status.passed in 0.004014s @scenario.end ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
